svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - July 19 2018
News and Links
Protocol
• Notes from the second sharding meetup
Notes from the second sharding meetup
• Vitalik’s IC3 sharding slides
Vitalik’s IC3 sharding slides
• VDF-based RNG with linear lookahead
VDF-based RNG with linear lookahead
• Dan Boneh’s paper on VDFs
Dan Boneh’s paper on VDFs
• Latest Casper standup
Latest Casper standup
• Recursive proximity to justification as FFG fork choice rule
Recursive proximity to justification as FFG fork choice rule
• Making the RANDAO less influenceable using a random 1 bit clock
Making the RANDAO less influenceable using a random 1 bit clock
• Latest Plasma implementers call
Latest Plasma implementers call
• A maintained list of Plasma implementations , part of larger Learn Plasma
A maintained list of Plasma implementations , part of larger Learn Plasma
• Batch auctions with uniform clearing price on plasma
Batch auctions with uniform clearing price on plasma
• Videos: getting started with SWARM poc3 (4 video series)
Videos: getting started with SWARM poc3 (4 video series)
Stuff for developers
• Remix IDE v0.6.4
Remix IDE v0.6.4
• Print interview with Truffle devs , including how they work
Print interview with Truffle devs , including how they work
• Migrating your Truffle project to Web3.js v1.0
Migrating your Truffle project to Web3.js v1.0
• Gitcoin attaches job listings to bounties , so you know if the bounty funder is hiring
Gitcoin attaches job listings to bounties , so you know if the bounty funder is hiring
• A practical walkthrough of smart contract storage
A practical walkthrough of smart contract storage
• Analysing the opdcode costs of storage on Ethereum
Analysing the opdcode costs of storage on Ethereum
• solidity-cli - caching for faster compilation, multi-threading, Typescript support
solidity-cli - caching for faster compilation, multi-threading, Typescript support
• Ethereum on ARM . Armbian image for NanoPc-T4
Ethereum on ARM . Armbian image for NanoPc-T4
Release
• Parity v2.0 beta - major release with shift to “mission-critical use” and not end-user software, so
no more GUI. Also, Parity 1.11.7-stable
Live on mainnet
• imbrex (formerly RexMLS) is now live on mainnet with 2200 listings from Toll Brothers
Ecosystem
• Starkware announces “big” grant from Ethereum Foundation
Starkware announces “big” grant from Ethereum Foundation
• More on Devcon4 tickets - 2/3 are discounted or free, aimed at builders and students.
More on Devcon4 tickets - 2/3 are discounted or free, aimed at builders and students.
• MLB Crypto Baseball - Major League Baseball is doing a crypto collectible game with Lucid Sight.
Yahoo coverage . Cyrus Lohrasbpour looks at the Terms and Conditions .
MLB Crypto Baseball - Major League Baseball is doing a crypto collectible game with Lucid Sight. Yahoo
coverage . Cyrus Lohrasbpour looks at the Terms and Conditions .
• Blockchain user onboarding slides
Blockchain user onboarding slides
• Etherscan now previews ERC721 tokens
Etherscan now previews ERC721 tokens
• You can pre-order Raspberry PI Ethereum modules from Oaken and Zymbit. [Disclosure: I invested in
Oaken]
You can pre-order Raspberry PI Ethereum modules from Oaken and Zymbit. [Disclosure: I invested in
• Gnosis Safe deploys on Rinkeby testnet. 2/4 multisig default. Koeppelman tweetstorm explanation
Gnosis Safe deploys on Rinkeby testnet. 2/4 multisig default. Koeppelman tweetstorm explanation
Governance and Standards
• EIP1231 : Reduce cost of calls to precompiles
EIP1231 : Reduce cost of calls to precompiles
• ERC1228 : Delegated execution
ERC1228 : Delegated execution
• A tentative plan to decentralize Aragon’s governance
A tentative plan to decentralize Aragon’s governance
• A recap of Ethereum Magicians Berlin
A recap of Ethereum Magicians Berlin
Project Updates
• Augur is nearing $1m in open interest. First markets resolve . Medcredits created a market on
whether they would release on time
Augur is nearing $1m in open interest. First markets resolve . Medcredits created a market on whether
they would release on time
• the new 0x Portal
the new 0x Portal
• Raiden at 100% to go live for testnet
Raiden at 100% to go live for testnet
• A guide to Rocketpool’s beta using (deprecated) FFG v0.2
A guide to Rocketpool’s beta using (deprecated) FFG v0.2
• Digix gets clean audit for its gold
Digix gets clean audit for its gold
• Two new projects under Cofound.it umbrella: Cofab to build tools for startups and D2 Capital to help
projects manage their crypto assets [irregular reminder: I’m an advisor]
Two new projects under Cofound.it umbrella: Cofab to build tools for startups and D2 Capital to help
• Earn iExec tokens in their “workerdrop” mainnet test starting July 20
Earn iExec tokens in their “workerdrop” mainnet test starting July 20
• The road to AdChain launching the first TCR
The road to AdChain launching the first TCR
Interviews, Podcasts, Videos, Talks
• Vitalik Buterin talks to Tyler Cowen. Hurray for transcripts.
Vitalik Buterin talks to Tyler Cowen. Hurray for transcripts.
• Matt Condon and Jonathan Mann start NFT podcast Digitally Rare
Matt Condon and Jonathan Mann start NFT podcast Digitally Rare
• Andrew Keys on Coin Offering
Andrew Keys on Coin Offering
• Simon de la Rouviere and Trent McConaghy talk TCRs, Curation Markets, and Artonomous
Simon de la Rouviere and Trent McConaghy talk TCRs, Curation Markets, and Artonomous
Tokens
• Collateralizing rural loans with NFTs
Collateralizing rural loans with NFTs
• Panvala’s opening applications for partners to buy tokens, which they’ll use to try to equal
holdings between partners and users.
Panvala’s opening applications for partners to buy tokens, which they’ll use to try to equal holdings
between partners and users.
• Who wants free Livepeer tokens ? Here’s an explainer video of how you can (probably) get some. Also
another very interesting token distribution experiment
Who wants free Livepeer tokens ? Here’s an explainer video of how you can (probably) get some. Also
General
• Polkadot upgrades to POC2 in first on-chain protocol upgrade, you can now create parachains, and has
libp2p in Rust. Q3 2019 mainnet launch ?
Polkadot upgrades to POC2 in first on-chain protocol upgrade, you can now create parachains, and has
• The CFA Institute adds crypto and blockchain topics to the exams. Wish they’d had that when I did
the exams.
The CFA Institute adds crypto and blockchain topics to the exams. Wish they’d had that when I did the
exams.
• MyCrypto’s “ Security Guide for Dummies and Smart People Too ”
MyCrypto’s “ Security Guide for Dummies and Smart People Too ”
• de la Rouviere: Harberger taxes and blockchain experimentations
de la Rouviere: Harberger taxes and blockchain experimentations
• If you’ve seen the headlines for “ 7 questions for crypto from Vitalik ,” here they are
If you’ve seen the headlines for “ 7 questions for crypto from Vitalik ,” here they are

If you appreciate this newsletter, thank ConsenSys
This newsletter is made possible by ConsenSys , which is perpetually hiring if you’re interested.
Editorial control is 100% me. If you’re unhappy with editorial decisions, feel free to tweet at me.
Shameless self-promotion
Most of what I link to I tweet first: @evan_van_ness
